message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone with your needs. I'm initially proposing a price of $2,300,000.  I'm open to discussing the price further, so please let me know your thoughts.

Alice, your initial offer is far too high for my budget. I'm interested in this product but I can't afford to pay that much. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for it. This is my best offer. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate you countering and recognizing the value of this product.  While your offer is significantly below my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000.  I believe this still reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

Alice, I understand you believe the product is worth more, but $1,900,000 is still out of my price range. I'm willing to go up to $1,000,000, but that's my absolute maximum. If you're not willing to come down further, I'll have to look at other options.
